description.en: The course allows acquiring basic knowledge and skills to design and carry out educational research.
description.et: Ainekursus võimaldab omandada põhilised teadmised ja oskused haridusteadusliku uurimistöö kavandamiseks ning läbiviimiseks.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to support students' in developing their research knowledge and skills and form their understanding about the nature and implementation of educational research.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärk on toetada üliõpilasi uurivaks õpetajaks kujunemisel ning kujundada arusaama haridusteadusliku uurimistöö olemusest ja läbiviimisest.

learning_outcomes.en:
A student who has passed the course: 
1) knows, why the research of learning and teaching is important in teachers's work and also values the dissemination of pedagogical knowledge 
2) is familiar with the nature of educational research (including research ethics), philosophical standpoints and research process 
3) knows the most common research designs, strategies, data collection and data analysis methods in researching learning and teaching; and is able to make  informed choices in designing and carrying out educational research 
4) is familiar with the quality criteria for research and based on this is able to critically analyse and evaluate the research   
5) is able, if necessary, to supervise the designing of and carrying out students' work
